About Company

Footnote Consults Limited, FCL is a private owned company that was established in 2018. The Company offers a broad spectrum in Civil engineering, Architecture and Project management. FCL is constituted by smart hardworking and resilient engineers, architects and project managers that will add every bit of value to money.
